message.pwa-not-supported: Progressive Web App (PWA) is not supported

frame.warning-message: This application is displayed via iframe, and some functions such as downloading may inaccessible. It is recommended to visite the original page.

description.base: A versatile online toolset that provides Web front-end development resources, GIS development resources, Qt development resources, online code editing and image export functions, online Markdown editing and PDF export functions, information query functions, hardware detection tools, etc.
description.gis-tile-download: GIS Tile Download, Supports Google Maps, Amap, ArcGiS, Open Street Map, satellite images and custom links.
description.qt-theme: Qt theme, select, preview Qt themes and download resource package online.
description.svg-icon: Qt compatible Svg icon preview and download.
description.markdown-editor: The online Markdown editor supports real-time preview, PDF export, and printing.
description.code-editor: The online code editor supports syntax highlighting in more than 100 languages such as C, C++, Python, TypeScript, and Lua, and supports exporting code as images.
description.ip-location: IP location query supports querying the IP address of the machine and the location of any IP address.
description.calculator: Calculator supports sin, cos, tan, asin, acos, atan, lg, ln, abs, power, root, factorial, ceil, floor and round

message.please-select: Please select the area in map to download.
message.please-keep: Please keep this page visible to avoid being frozen by the browser.
message.unknown-error: Unknown error, may be a compatibility issue, it is recommended to use the desktop Chrome browser.

markdown-editor.lag-warning: This feature may cause page lags
markdown-editor.info: The [Export] function is implemented through the browser's printing interface, and some browsers may not be available. It is recommended to use the Chrome browser. When exporting PDF, it is recommended to select [Save as PDF] for the [Destination] option.

bad-pixel-detection.message: Click the [Full Screen] button to start the test, click the mouse or press any key to switch colors, observe whether there are spots with different colors on the monitor. Press [ESC] to exit full screen to end the test.

frame-rate-detection.message: The white squares in the screen should move continuously. If the movement is discontinuous (a black square is skipped), it means that the monitor has a frame skip. You can take photos with a camera with a shutter speed of 1/10 second or more. If you capture less than 3 white squares, please extend the shutter speed and try again. When there are black squares between the white squares in the shot, it means that the display is skipping frames.
